    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_79726</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Thermosetting plastics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thermostatoplastischer Plastik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plastiques thermodurcissables</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plásticos thermosetting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Plastica termoindurente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Thermosetting πλαστικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plásticos termoendurecibles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations showing how the long chains in the two types of polymers are arranged. Here, covalent bonds form between the chains in thermosetting plastics when it is first heated, preventing them to soften be remoulded when heated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">covalent bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cross-linkages</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat treatment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular chains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">organic compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polymers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">remoulding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">softening</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermosoftening plastics</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die 
zeigen, wie die langen Ketten in den zwei Typen der Polymer-Plastiken 
geordnet werden. Hier bilden sich kovalente Bindungen zwischen 
den Ketten im thermostatoplastischen Plastik, wenn er zuerst erhitzt 
wird und verhindern sie, um zu erweichen, sind remoulded, wenn sie 
erhitzt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations montrant 
comment les longues chaînes dans les deux types de polymères sont 
arrangées. Ici, la forme covalente d'obligations entre les 
chaînes en plastiques thermodurcissables quand elle est d'abord 
chauffée, les empêchant pour se ramollir soit restructurée une
fois de chauffage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram como
as correntes longas nos dois tipos de polímeros são arranjadas. 
Aqui, as ligações covalent dão forma entre as correntes nos 
plásticos thermosetting quando é aquecido primeiramente, impedindo 
os para amaciar sejam remoulded quando aquecidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
mostrano come le catene lunghe nei due tipi di polimeri sono 
organizzate. Qui, i legami covalenti formano fra le catene in 
plastica termoindurente quando in primo luogo è riscaldato, impedente
lei per ammorbidire sono remoulded una volta riscaldati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που επιδεικνύουν πώς οι 
μακριές σειρές στους δύο τύπους πολυμερών σωμάτων 
τακτοποιούνται. Εδώ, οι ομοιοπολικοί δεσμοί διαμορφώνουν 
μεταξύ των αλυσίδων στα thermosetting πλαστικά όταν 
θερμαίνεται αρχικά, η παρεμπόδιση τους για να μαλακώσει 
αναμορφώνεται όταν θερμαίνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que 
muestran cómo los encadenamientos largos en los dos tipos de 
polímeros se arreglan. Aquí, los enlaces covalentes forman 
entre los encadenamientos de los plásticos termoendurecibles cuando 
primero se calienta, previniéndolos para ablandar sean remoulded 
cuando están calentados.</string>
          </description>
